text: yang mi thung wela xik hrux sahrab brrda phu sraththa thi hawcı khxng phwk khea ca nxbnxm tx kar ra luk thung xallxhˌ læa sing sung di mi lng ma khux khwam cring læa phwk khea xya di pen chen brrda phu thi di rab khamphir ma tæ kxn ni læw chwng wela di neinnan keinpi kæ phwk khea dangnan citcı khxng phwk khea cung khæng kradang læa swn mak khxng phwk khea cung pen phu fafun
